name: Uphill Rush Madness ( by Free 3D Car Racing Games )
name_original: Uphill Rush Madness ( by Free 3D Car Racing Games )
description:
ADDICTIVE is a word to define this incredibly fun hectic car game where you smash what ever comes on your way.A game well worth sinking your time and money into.
Featuring an incredibly cool and insane amount of Vector graphics.There’s also a decent amount of variety in terms of backgrounds,road and vehicles as it is always nice to have more.
Warning : So addictive that this game can eat hours and hours of Playing.
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
